pullrequest.title: per issue #194, alternative solution, add ROS service, allowing user to change joint damping with hard coded per joint bounds

content.raw: It seems like the damping in the "dynamics" tag and CFM damping are being talked about interchangeably. I was under the impression that they were different concepts. Am I misunderstanding?
content.html: It seems like the damping in the "dynamics" tag and CFM damping are being talked about interchangeably. I was under the impression that they were different concepts. Am I misunderstanding?
